description: Adds a set of actions to work with the loading of resources: Downloading a texture at runtime, loading a JSON into a scene variable, and more!
name: ResourceLoadingTools
shortDescription: Adds multiple actions to work with the loading of resources.

eventsFunctions.description: Loads a JSON resource into a scene structure variable.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load a JSON resource in a scene variable
eventsFunctions.name: GetJSONResource

parameters.description: The resource to load the JSON from
parameters.name: Resource

parameters.description: The scene variable to load the JSON to
parameters.name: Variable

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces the image contained by a sprite by a new one, from a URL. This will only affect the sprite in question and only until the image in it is changed through its animation or another action, unless you also modify the resource.
eventsFunctions.name: LoadURLIntoSprite
eventsFunctions.sentence: Load URL _PARAM1_ into sprite _PARAM2_ (and into the corresponding resource: _PARAM3_)

parameters.description: The URL to load the new image for the sprite from
parameters.name: URL

parameters.longDescription: If yes, modifies the image contained in the resource of the sprite's current frame instead of just the sprite's displayed image. This makes the changes affect all other sprites that also display this resource, and allows the change to persist after changing animations or the current frame.
parameters.name: ChangeResource

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces the image contained by a resource by a new one, from a URL. This will update all sprites displaying the resource.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load URL into an image resource
eventsFunctions.name: LoadURLIntoImageResource

parameters.description: The URL to load the new image for the resource from
parameters.name: URL

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces the audio contained by a resource by a new one, from a URL. This will stop all sounds currently using this resource.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Load URL into an audio resource
eventsFunctions.name: LoadURLIntoAudioResource

parameters.description: The URL to load the new audio for the resource from
parameters.name: URL
